data.message: i dunno what sort of online techno Shady might have... but his writing and passion is right where it belongs... and so i'm surviving my own life better every day.... bless u Marshall... u in my dreams, my astral body and past lives a whole lot more than i expected to discover ... and it feels just like "yesterlives"... fresh n' raw it was... wild n' trippy - i'm cool with all this for ONE reason -- i loved you deeply "then" so why would it ever change in this life ??? i mean, u rock the mic and i been an otherwise everyday ordinary Shady fan all these years anyway... xoxooxoxoxo
